mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscription (subscriber_username, publisher_username, created_at) VALUES (#{subscriberUsername}, #{publisherUsername}, #{createdAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM subscription WHERE subscriber_username = #{subscriberUsername} AND publisher_username = #{publisherUsername}
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM users u JOIN subscription s ON u.username = s.publisher_username WHERE s.subscriber_username = #{username}
